title: Aubrey Organics Hydrating Shampoo Normal Blue Chamomile -- 16 fl oz
description: Blue Camomile Hydrating Shampoo by Aubrey Organics 16 oz Liquid Blue Camomile Hydrating Shampoo 16 oz Liquid Product Calm cool and collected. Give your hair a new attitude. Lather in softness and shine with this naturally hydrating shampoo made with exotic organic blue camomile and shea butter. Refreshing formula lightly conditions as it cleanses to leave hair full silky and manageable. Alternate with Camomile Luxurious Volumizing Shampoo for best results. Ingredients Deionized Water Coconut Oil-Corn Oil Soap Organic Aloe Vera Hydrolyzed Soy Protein (made from organic non-GMO soybeans) Carrageenan Organic Shea Butter Horsetail Extract Coltsfoot Extract Linoleic Acid (Vitamin F) Aubrey's Preservative (Citrus Seed Extract Vitamins A C and E) Organic Blue Camomile Oil. title: Yu-Be Original Cream - Jar 2.2 oz.
description: Yu-Be, Japan's best-selling medicated, vitamin-enriched moisturizing skin cream, is a non-petroleum hydration formula that heals and smoothes rough, cracked and dry skin. Glycerin composition protects against intense weather and environmental conditions that irritate and damage skin. Formulated with all-natural ingredients like Vitamin E and B2 for a soft, renewed skin. Versatile for body, face and lips.
